figure.alt: Behind Every Great Product by Marty Cagan at Mind the Product London 2016

post.content: In the opening keynote at this year’s London MTPCon, Silicon Valley Product Group’s Marty Cagan shared his latest thoughts on what makes a great product manager by looking at the history of some great products.
